Title: Preparing High School Students for Calculus and Integrating Calculus into the Classroom
Co-PIName(s): Wayne Sullivan, Richard Harville, Katherine Johnson
Abstract: Through a planning grant, Volunteer State Community College is coordinating a regional effort. Based on surveys with the local rural high schools, critical aspects concerning mathematics instruction in the region will be identified. Through a series of workshops involving consultants, a regional coalition strategy for improving the quality of math instruction will be developed.//

Title: Comprehensive Assistance to Undergraduate Science Education
